document_data.mainbody:
Nascent Owens was a zombie servant reanimated by Cherish Hollow, the author of The Amiable Art of Necromancy, sometime in or before the late 14 century DR.
Nascent Owens was turned into an undead sometime before the . His mistress, Cherish Hollow, believed that the shambling creature derived pleasure from giving her backrubs, serving tea, and eating the brains of her enemies. Despite Nascent remembering nothing of lis life nor having any sentience, Cherish believed that the zombie was a worthy company in her loneliness.
